description:
#LDJAM #LD34 72 hour prototype entry for theme 'growing'

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=p...

Ragnar the Village Defender

Defend the village from the nasty evil Niddhog that awakes.

--- CONTROLS ---

A = Move left

J = Move right

E = Toggle weapon (axe=wood chopping, spear=hunt, hammer=end game weapon)

J = Hit/use weapon

X = use campfire to (+upgrade current weapon) OR build house (+score)
